title: Withdrawal Made
description: Fired when a withdrawal is made from an account.

amount.description: The monetary amount of the withdrawal.

accountId.description: Identifier of the account from which the withdrawal is made.

currency.description: ISO 4217 3-letter currency code (e.g. USD, EUR, GBP).

withdrawalMethod.description: The method used for the withdrawal.

transactionId.description: Unique identifier for the withdrawal transaction.
